mapper.insert: insert into publicAffairs_socialServices (classTeacher, status, name, tpye, note, year, semester) values (#{classTeacher,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{tpye,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{note,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{year,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{semester,jdbcType=NVARCHAR})
mapper.update: update publicAffairs_socialServices set classTeacher = #{classTeacher,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, name = #{name,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, tpye = #{tpye,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, note = #{note,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, year = #{year,jdbcType=INTEGER}, semester = #{semester,jdbcType=NVARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
